Description of incident: The theft of a laptop resulted in the exposure of patient information.  Names, Social Security numbers, dates of birth, residential facility names, and digital oral x-ray images may have been exposed.  Specific details of the case are being withheld until the breach investigation has concluded.  The location of the breach is listed as the corporate headquarters of MAH.  Those with questions or concerns may contact the MAH Compliance Department at 1-855-224-0004.
